channel.title: 🏢 Integrated Vision and Language Lab, KAIST, South Korea on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Integrated Vision and Language Lab, KAIST, South Korea on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: CODE: Contrasting Self-generated Description to Combat Hallucination in Large Multi-modal Models
item.description: CODE combats LMM hallucinations by contrasting self-generated descriptions with visual content during decoding, enhancing response accuracy without retraining.
